trans-unit.source: Displays ADO.NET data in a scrollable grid.
trans-unit.target: 在可捲動方格中顯示 ADO.NET 資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control replaces and adds functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control; however, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項會取代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控制項並加入其他功能，不過您也可以選擇保留 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控制項，以提供回溯相容性及未來使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> displays Web-like links to child tables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>子資料表顯示類似網頁的連結。

trans-unit.source: You can click on a link to navigate to the child table.
trans-unit.target: 您可以按一下連結，可瀏覽至子資料表。

trans-unit.source: When a child table is displayed, a back button appears in the caption that can be clicked to navigate back to the parent table.
trans-unit.target: 顯示子資料表時，可以按一下瀏覽回父資料表的標題出現後的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The data from the parent rows is displayed below the caption and above the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 從父資料列的資料會顯示在標題下方和資料行標頭上方。

trans-unit.source: You can hide the parent row information by clicking the button to the right of the back button.
trans-unit.target: 您可以按一下右邊的 [上一頁] 按鈕的按鈕隱藏父資料列資訊。

trans-unit.source: To display a table in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties to a valid data source.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示資料表中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>執行階段使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>方法，以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>有效的資料來源的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following data sources are valid:
trans-unit.target: 下列資料來源是有效值：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataTable>
A <xref:System.Data.DataView>
A <xref:System.Data.DataSet>
A <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>
A single dimension array
trans-unit.target: 單一維度陣列

trans-unit.source: Any component that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface
trans-unit.target: 實作的元件，<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>介面

trans-unit.source: Any component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface
trans-unit.target: 實作的元件，<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> class, see [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Data.DataSet>類別，請參閱[資料集、 Datatable 和 Dataview](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立一個方格，其中可讓使用者編輯資料，但防止加入新資料列使用<xref:System.Data.DataView>做為資料來源並設定<xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Data sources are further managed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源會進一步受<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>物件。

trans-unit.source: For each table in a data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> can be returned from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料表中資料來源，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>可從表單的傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can determine the number of rows contained by a data source by returning the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以判斷藉由傳回相關聯資料來源所包含的資料列數目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>物件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To validate data, use the underlying objects that represent data and their events.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證資料，使用的基礎物件表示的資料和其事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data comes from a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果資料來自<xref:System.Data.DataTable>中<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，使用<xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>事件。

trans-unit.source: Because the number of columns can be customized (by adding or deleting members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) and the rows can be sorted by column, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> property values cannot be guaranteed to correspond to <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> indexes in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 因為您可以自訂的資料行數目 (藉由新增或刪除的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) 和資料行，可以排序資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>屬性值不能保證以對應至<xref:System.Data.DataRow>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>索引<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore you should avoid using those properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event to validate data.
trans-unit.target: 因此您應該避免使用這些屬性在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>事件，以驗證資料。

trans-unit.source: To determine which cell is selected, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪一個儲存格已選取，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Change the value of any cell by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A> property, which can take either the row and column indexes of the cell, or a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: 透過任一儲存格的值變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A>屬性，可能需要資料列和資料行索引的資料格，或是單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>。

trans-unit.source: Monitor the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged> event to detect when the user selects another cell.
trans-unit.target: 監視<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged>事件來偵測當使用者選取另一個資料格。

trans-unit.source: To determine which part of the control the user clicked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪一個部分控制項的使用者已按下，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> object, which contains the row and column of a clicked area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>物件，其中包含資料列並按下區域的資料行。

trans-unit.source: To manage the appearance of the control at run time, several properties for setting the color and caption attributes are available, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理控制項的外觀，在執行階段，設定色彩和標題屬性的一些屬性，以供選擇，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A>，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the displayed grid (or grids) can be further modified by creating <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects and adding them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 顯示方格 （或方格） 的外觀可以藉由建立進一步修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>物件並將它們加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>，這透過存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> containing three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, you can add three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the collection, one for each table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>設<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含三個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件，您可以新增三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>物件加入該集合，每個資料表的一個。

trans-unit.source: To synchronize each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> object with a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 若要同步處理每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>物件<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>來<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about binding to an array of objects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列繫結的相關資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To create a customized view of a table, create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> class and add the object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的自訂的檢視的資料表，建立的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>類別，並將物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>透過存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Both classes inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個類別都是繼承自 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>。

trans-unit.source: For each column style, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a column that you want to show in the grid.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料行樣式，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>至<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>您想要在方格中顯示之資料行。

trans-unit.source: To hide a column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to something other than a valid <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏資料行，將其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>以外是有效的值<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To format the text of a column, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> to one of the values found in [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要格式化的文字資料行，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>中找到之值的其中一個[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>物件類型必須為物件的強型別陣列包含公用屬性。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `typename[]` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>顯示陣列，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`typename[]`其中`typename`會以物件類型的名稱取代。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>屬性會區分大小寫，則必須完全相符的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>屬性的範例。

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>至<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: 一項功能<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是，它可以包含物件的多個類型，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>只能繫結這類清單在清單中的所有項目時的第一個項目相同的型別。

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 這表示所有物件都必須屬於相同的類型，或它們必須繼承自相同清單中的第一個項目類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在清單中的第一個項目是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，第二個項目可能是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>)。

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 如果相反地，第一個項目是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，第二個物件不能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>它繫結時，必須有項目中。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: 空白<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>會導致空的方格。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the objects in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在物件<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>必須包含公用屬性。

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>至"ArrayList 」 （類型名稱）。

trans-unit.source: For each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you can set color and caption attributes that override the settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>、 您可以設定色彩和標題屬性 (attribute) 的設定會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項。

trans-unit.source: However, if those properties are not set, the settings for the control are used by default.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果未設定這些屬性，預設會使用控制項的設定。

trans-unit.source: The following properties can be overridden by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> properties:
trans-unit.target: 下列屬性可以覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>屬性：

trans-unit.source: To customize the appearance of individual columns, add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂個別資料行的外觀，新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>，這透過存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>每個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>。

trans-unit.source: To synchronize each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> with a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 若要同步處理每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>與<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>中<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>至<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>。

trans-unit.source: When constructing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you can also set a formatting string that specifies how the column displays data.
trans-unit.target: 建構時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>，您也可以設定格式化的字串，指定資料行顯示資料的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify that the column use a short-date format to display dates contained in the table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定資料行使用簡短日期格式顯示資料表中包含的日期。

trans-unit.source: Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 永遠建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件，並將其新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>加入之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 當您將加入空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>的有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值加入集合中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>自動為您產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，發生例外狀況會擲回您嘗試加入新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件具有重複<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control; however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 控制項會取代 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> 控制項並加入其他功能，不過您也可以選擇保留 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> 控制項，以提供回溯相容性及未來使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Forms DataGridView 和 DataGrid 控制項之間的差異](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a Windows form, a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> containing two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, and a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> that relates the two tables.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立 Windows form，<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含兩個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件，和<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>與相關的兩個資料表。

trans-unit.source: To display the data, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control is then bound to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示資料，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項則繫結到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A button on the form changes the appearance of the grid by creating two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of each object to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of one of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 在表單上的按鈕變更格線的外觀，藉由建立兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>物件和設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>給每一個物件<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>其中<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件。

trans-unit.source: The example also contains code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method to print the column, row, and part of the grid that has been clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也包含程式碼中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>所使用的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>列印資料行、 資料列和格線已經按下的部分方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To populate a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property to a valid source, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>.
trans-unit.target: 若要填入新建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>屬性設為有效的來源，例如<xref:System.Data.DataView>， <xref:System.Data.DataSet>，或<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>並用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>方法，以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether navigation is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否允許巡覽作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if navigation is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允許巡覽作業，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, links to child tables are not shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，不會顯示子資料表連結。

trans-unit.source: The following code example toggles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> property between the `true` and `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例切換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>屬性之間`true`和`false`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> property is set to `false`, then no links to child tables are shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>屬性設定為`false`，則會不顯示任何子資料表的連結。

trans-unit.source: The following code example resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> property and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigationChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>屬性並引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigationChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid can be resorted by clicking on a column header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否按一下資料行行首即可排序方格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if columns can be sorted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可排序資料行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is overridden by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property if there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> currently in effect for the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，如果沒有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>目前控制項的作用中。

trans-unit.source: If sorting is allowed, clicking on a column header will sort the table data by that column.
trans-unit.target: 如果允許排序，則按一下資料行標頭會排序依據該資料行的資料表資料。

trans-unit.source: You can also sort using an expression for a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以排序使用的運算式<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> for details on creating a sort expression.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>如需詳細資訊，在建立排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, you can set a custom sort for the table using the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class's <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>繫結至<xref:System.Data.DataView>，您可以設定資料表使用的自訂排序<xref:System.Data.DataView>類別的<xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>, each table in the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> can have a custom sort by setting the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A> class's <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>繫結至<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>，每個資料表中的<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>可以藉由設定有自訂排序<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A>類別的<xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example toggles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例切換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of odd-numbered rows of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定方格奇數資料列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the alternating background color.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，代表替換背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for windows (<see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window" />).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為視窗系統色彩 (<see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window" />)。

trans-unit.source: By default, both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> properties are set to the same color.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，同時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>屬性會設為相同的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> affects only odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>屬性會影響只有其偶數資料列，同時設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>影響只奇數資料列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Color> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.Color>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see langword="Back" /> button on a child table is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下子資料表的 <see langword="Back" /> 按鈕時。

trans-unit.source: The `Back` button becomes visible when a child table is displayed.
trans-unit.target: `Back`子資料表顯示時，會看見按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the button will cause the grid to display the parent table.
trans-unit.target: 按一下按鈕，將會導致方格顯示父資料表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackButtonClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackButtonClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of even-numbered rows of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定方格其偶數資料列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color of rows in the grid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，代表方格中的資料列色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for windows (<see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window" />).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為視窗系統色彩 (<see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window" />)。

trans-unit.source: Whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> property determines the color of rows in the grid, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> determines the color of the nonrow area, which is only visible when the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid.
trans-unit.target: 而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>屬性會決定在方格中，資料列的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>決定 nonrow 區域中，才看得見，由上至下，捲動方格時，或者如果只有少數資料列會包含在方格中的色彩。

trans-unit.source: By default, both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> properties are set to the same color.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，同時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>屬性會設為相同的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> affects only odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>屬性會影響只有其偶數資料列，同時設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>影響只奇數資料列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> properties to different values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會同時設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>屬性，以不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the non-row area of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定方格的資料列以外區域的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color of the grid's background.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，代表方格的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace" /> color.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace" /> 色彩。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> determines the color of the nonrow area of the grid, which is only visible when no table is displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or if the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>決定 nonrow 區域才看得見，當資料表不會顯示在格線的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或如果由上至下，捲動方格，或者如果只有少數資料列會包含在方格中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor" /> 變更時。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> property value from yellow to red and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>從黃色的屬性值為紅色，引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員對這個控制項來說不具意義。

trans-unit.source: The background image associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 與控制項相關聯的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A>屬性不是有意義，此控制項，雖然您可以變更其值和處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageChanged>事件，以偵測到變更。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員對這個控制項來說不具意義。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayoutChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>屬性不是有意義，此控制項，雖然您可以變更其值和處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayoutChanged>事件，以偵測到變更。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要編輯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要編輯的資料列編號。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to put the grid into a state where editing is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將方格放入允許編輯的狀態中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法成功，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The grid will deny edit requests if the user already started typing into a cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者已開始在資料格中輸入方格將會拒絕編輯要求。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> method will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> method to test if editing is possible before changing a specified column and row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>方法來測試如果編輯可變更指定之資料行和資料列之前。

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 開始對表單或另一個元件所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 進行初始化作業。

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化發生於執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio design environment uses this method to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Studio 設計環境會使用這個方法來開始初始化用於表單或為另一個元件所使用的元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>方法結束初始化。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>方法可防止控制項完全初始化之前使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the grid's border style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定方格的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="FixedSingle" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="FixedSingle" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the style of the grid's border.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定方格的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle" /> 變更時。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include `None`, `FixedSingle`, and `Fixed3D`.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括 `None`、`FixedSingle` 和 `Fixed3D`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> named `DataGrid1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>名為`DataGrid1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current edit operation and rolls back all changes.
trans-unit.target: 取消目前編輯作業並復原所有變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the caption area.

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定由那個儲存格取得焦點 (Focus)。

trans-unit.source: Not available at design time.
trans-unit.target: 無法在設計階段使用。

trans-unit.target: 具有焦點的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />。

trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>屬性會使捲動，並顯示是否它已不可見的資料格方格。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定和取得目前儲存格。

trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: To determine the current cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷目前的儲存格，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets index of the row that currently has focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前具有焦點之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the current row.
trans-unit.target: 目前資料列以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A> property to a value other than its current value scrolls the control so that the specified row is in view.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A>屬性及其目前值以外的值來捲動控制項，檢視中會有指定的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A> property enables you to iterate through a parent table's rows even if you are viewing the child table rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A>屬性可讓您逐一父資料表的資料列，即使您正在檢視子資料表資料列。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are viewing a child table, incrementing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A> will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to display the next set of records in the child table that are linked to the parent table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您正在檢視子資料表中，遞增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A>會導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>顯示子資料表連結至父資料表中的下一組記錄。

trans-unit.source: If the user is viewing a parent table, or a table with no child relations, then the property returns the zero-based index of the current row.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者在沒有子關聯檢視父資料表或資料表，屬性就會傳回目前的資料列的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A>。

trans-unit.source: There is no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 沒有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員對這個控制項來說不具意義。

trans-unit.source: The type of cursor to display as the mouse pointer moves over the object.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠指標移至物件上方時所顯示的游標類型。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CursorChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor%2A>屬性不是有意義，此控制項，雖然您可以變更其值和處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CursorChanged>事件，以偵測到變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific list in a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" /> for which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control displays a grid.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" /> 中的特定清單，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控制項將使用方格顯示這個清單。

trans-unit.source: A list in a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" /> 中的清單。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> contains multiple sources of data, you should set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> to one of the sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>包含多個來源的資料，您應該設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>至其中一個來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify one of the tables to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>，其中包含三個資料表都叫做`Customers`， `Orders`，和`OrderDetails`，您必須指定其中一個繫結至資料表。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> contains only one <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, you should set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of that <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>只包含<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，您應該設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>至<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects, parent tables will appear with a plus sign (+) in each row header.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>設<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>物件的父資料表中將會出現加號 （+） 中每個資料列行首。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the plus sign causes a node to appear that contains links to child tables.
trans-unit.target: 按一下加號會導致出現，其中包含子資料表連結的節點。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects named `Customers` and `Orders`, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> to the `Customers` table causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to display a parent table with a plus sign visible on each row header.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含兩個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件命名`Customers`和`Orders`，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>至`Customers`資料表原因<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>上每個資料列顯示父資料表以顯示加號標頭。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> is set to `Orders`, however, the row headers will be blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>設`Orders`，不過，資料列標頭會是空白。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, <xref:System.Data.DataView>, collection, or array, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>是<xref:System.Data.DataTable>， <xref:System.Data.DataView>、 集合或陣列，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>屬性會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: At run time, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>方法來重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property alone can be reset at any time to a valid table name.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>屬性只可以重設在任何時間，以有效的資料表名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that the grid is displaying data for.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在方格中顯示資料的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: An object that functions as a data source.
trans-unit.target: 當做資料來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: At run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>方法，以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following data sources are valid:
trans-unit.target: 下列資料來源是有效值：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataTable>
A <xref:System.Data.DataView>
A <xref:System.Data.DataSet>
A <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>
Any component that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface
trans-unit.target: 實作的元件，<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>介面

trans-unit.source: Any component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface
trans-unit.target: 實作的元件，<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class overview for more information on data sources.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>如需有關資料來源類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> reference contains more than one table, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property a string that specifies the table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>參考包含多個資料表，您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>字串，指定要繫結至資料表的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify the table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>，其中包含三個資料表都叫做`Customers`， `Orders`，和`OrderDetails`，您必須指定要繫結至資料表。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> to an object that does not implement the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface or an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> will cause the grid to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>物件未實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>會導致擲回例外狀況的方格。

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立一個方格，其中可讓使用者編輯資料，但防止加入新資料列使用<xref:System.Data.DataView>做為資料來源並設定<xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>物件類型必須為物件的強型別陣列包含公用屬性。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>顯示陣列，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`typename`其中`typename`會以物件類型的名稱取代。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>屬性會區分大小寫，則必須完全相符的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>屬性的範例。

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>至<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: 一項功能<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是，它可以包含物件的多個類型，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>只能繫結這類清單在清單中的所有項目時的第一個項目相同的型別。

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 這表示所有物件都必須屬於相同的類型，或它們必須繼承自相同清單中的第一個項目類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在清單中的第一個項目是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，第二個項目可能是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>)。

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 如果相反地，第一個項目是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，第二個物件不能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>它繫結時，必須有項目中。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: 空白<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>會導致空的方格。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the objects in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在物件<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>必須包含公用屬性。

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>至"ArrayList 」 （類型名稱）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>, and when needed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>, to bind a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to both a <xref:System.Data.DataView> and a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>，並在需要時， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>、 繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>同時<xref:System.Data.DataView>和<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: The example also shows how to return data sources from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何傳回資料來源從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" /> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSourceChanged> event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> value changes, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSourceChanged>就會發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>值變更，或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>變更。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 處置 (Dispose) <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 所使用的資源 (除了記憶體之外)。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>讓它所佔用的記憶體可由記憶體回收收回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A> method to free resources.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A>方法來釋放資源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to cease editing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />，將停止編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to cease editing.
trans-unit.target: 要停止編輯作業的資料列編號。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> if the current operation should be stopped.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該停止目前作業，則設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Requests an end to an edit operation taking place on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 要求結束 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控制項的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the editing operation ceases; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果編輯作業停止，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A> method returns `false` if the user is not editing (typing into) a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A>方法會傳回`false`如果使用者無法編輯 （輸入） 的資料格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A> methods to edit a value in a grid displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A>方法，以編輯所顯示的方格中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 結束對表單或另一個元件所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 進行初始化作業。

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化發生於執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio design environment uses this method to end the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Studio 設計環境會使用這個方法來結束初始化用於表單或為另一個元件所使用的元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>方法初始化開始。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>方法可防止控制項完全初始化之前使用。

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to expand.
trans-unit.target: 要展開的資料列編號。

trans-unit.source: If set to -1, all rows are expanded.
trans-unit.target: 若設定為 -1，將展開所有資料列。

trans-unit.source: Displays child relations, if any exist, for all rows or a specific row.
trans-unit.target: 顯示所有資料列或指定資料列的子關聯 (如果存在的話)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the first visible column in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 取得方格第一個可見資料行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: A column is considered visible even if it is partially concealed.
trans-unit.target: 資料行被視為可見的即使部分被隱藏起來。

trans-unit.source: If a particular column is not visible, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to the cell that should be visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果看不到特定的資料行，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>應該是可見的儲存格的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example scrolls the grid if the first visible column is greater than five.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會捲動資料格，如果第一個可見資料行大於 5。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid displays in flat mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否以一般模式顯示方格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the grid is displayed flat; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果方格顯示為一般模式則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.FlatMode%2A>屬性，並通知使用者的狀態。

trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.FlatMode" /> 變更時。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color (typically the color of the text) property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控制項的前景色彩 (通常是文字的色彩) 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，代表前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText" /> color.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText" /> 色彩。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，指定儲存格四個端點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> to look up.
trans-unit.target: 要查詢的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />。

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 指定之儲存格的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，定義目前儲存格的四個端點。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCellBounds%2A>方法以傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>在指定的資料格。

trans-unit.source: The number of the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的資料列編號。

trans-unit.target: 取得資料列和資料行編號所指定的儲存格 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，定義目前儲存格的四個端點。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the cell bounds for the currently selected cell, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCurrentCellBounds%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取目前選取的儲存格的儲存格界限，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCurrentCellBounds%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCellBounds%2A> method to return a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> of a specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCellBounds%2A>方法以傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>在指定的資料格。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the four corners of the selected cell.

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例取得<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>選取儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that is the delimiter between columns when row contents are copied to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，這個字串是將資料列內容複製至剪貼簿時，介於資料行之間的分隔符號 (Delimiter)。

trans-unit.source: The string value "\t", which represents a tab used to separate columns in a row.
trans-unit.target: 字串值 "\t"，代表用來隔開資料列中資料行的索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關控制項資料的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Listens for the scroll event of the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 接聽水平捲軸的捲動事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定格線色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，代表格線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for controls (<see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control" />).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為控制項系統色彩 (<see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control" />)。

trans-unit.source: No grid line is displayed if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GridLineStyle%2A> property is set to `DataGridLineStyle.None`.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何格線會顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GridLineStyle%2A>屬性設定為`DataGridLineStyle.None`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the color of the grid's lines using a value passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定使用值傳遞給方法的格線的線條的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The value is not set.
trans-unit.target: 這個值並未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line style of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定格線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.OnBackColorChanged%2A> method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> that contains data about the pressed key.
trans-unit.target: 含有所按鍵資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果應該處理按鍵則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 方法會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A>方法，以實作方格的鍵盤巡覽。

trans-unit.target: 含有向上按鍵或向下按鍵事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes keys for grid navigation.
trans-unit.target: 處理格線巡視按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the key was processed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果處理按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> that contains data about the event.
trans-unit.target: 包含關於事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameter is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 該參數是以傳址方式傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message and returns a value indicating if the key was consumed.
trans-unit.target: 預覽鍵盤訊息並傳回數值，表示按鍵的使用狀況。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the key was consumed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鍵已使用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法稱為由子控制項的子控制項收到鍵盤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項產生訊息的任何鍵盤事件之前呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message consumed and does not generate any keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回`true`，將取用訊息視為子控制項，並不會產生任何鍵盤事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> that contains data about which the pressed key.
trans-unit.target: 含有哪個所按鍵資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the Tab key should be processed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示是否應該處理 Tab 鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the TAB key should be processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該處理 TAB 鍵則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: for drawing UI.
trans-unit.target: 用於繪製 UI。

trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示方格是否在唯讀模式中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the grid is in read-only mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果方格是唯讀模式，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In read-only mode, the grid can be scrolled, nodes can be expanded or collapsed, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 在唯讀模式中，您可以捲動方格中，可以展開或摺疊節點，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: However, no additions, edits, or deletes can take place.
trans-unit.target: 不過，沒有新增、 編輯或刪除便可以執行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> also has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A> property that can be set to true to prevent data from being edited, on a column-by-column basis.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>還有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>可以設定為 true，以防止資料正在編輯中，針對資料行的資料行的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A> can be set to true if you want to prohibit the user from editing the data directly in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A>可以設為 true，如果您想要禁止使用者編輯直接在資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to let users to see all columns in a table, but allow them to edit specific fields only through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls on a different form.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可能想要讓使用者查看所有的資料行在資料表中，但允許使用者編輯的特定欄位只能透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>不同表單上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example toggles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例切換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立一個方格，其中可讓使用者編輯資料，但防止加入新資料列使用<xref:System.Data.DataView>做為資料來源並設定<xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataView> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>是<xref:System.Data.DataView>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>為空字串 ("")。
